timeline.content:
Hello Sofia, thank you for contacting Amber Student for your accommodation search in London! As the official partner of University College London, we’re here to ensure you find the perfect place to stay.

I’m Shikha, and I’ll be guiding you through the process. Please let me know a convenient time to connect so we can move forward with discussing and exploring your preferred accommodation options.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Thankyou

timeline.content:
We have processed the booking for *Fusion Brent cross, London*
Kindly check your mail login link has been sent there.

Let me know if you have any doubt

I've been trying to reach you to discuss your accommodation in London. 
Please let me know a convenient time for us to talk, or we can continue the conversation here if that works better for you.

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Hello? Ha. I'm joking. I'm not here. Call me back. And if I don't answer, then I probably don't want to speak to you. Bye.
Speaker A: Please leave your message after the tone to re record your message key hash at any time. Please leave your message after the tone to re record your message key hash at any time.
